description:
This table contains the reference information from the remittance file when the receiver of the transaction is not


the payee (e.g., Clearing House or billing service ID).

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record.

columns.name: REF_ID_QUALIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code qualifying the Reference Identification


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Receiver Identification Number


Version Code - Local


Payer Identification Number


Submitter Identification Number


Health Industry Number


National Association of Insurance Commissioners(NAIC) Code


State License Number


Blue Cross Provider Number


Blue Shield Provider Number


Medicare Provider Number


Medicaid Provider Number


Dentist License Number


Anesthesia License Number


Provider UPIN Number


Tricare Identification Number


National Association of Boards of Pharmacy Number


Provider Commercial Number


Provider Plan Network Identification Number


Payee Identification


Federal Taxpayer's Identification Number

columns.name: REFERENCE_INFO
columns.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query.
